bibl.title: kinhtiçn / binhtiçn in P. Köln 203 A 14. <kinetian, binetian>
bibl.note: Replies to: R. NÜNLIST, P. Mich. inv. 6950 (unpubliziert), P. Köln 203 und 243: Szenen aus Menanders Dis Exapaton?, ZPE 99 (1993) p. 262. - The verb b]inhtiçn (or as the case may be kinhtiçn) bearing an active meaning in P. Köln V, 203 A, 14 remains unique. The trimeter proverb oÈde‹w komÆthw ˜stiw oÈ binhtiçi clearly refers to pueri capillati who are pathic homosexuals. <b]inetian, kinetian, oudeis kometes hostis ou binetai>
bibl.seg: BAIN David, kinhtiçn / binhtiçn in P. Köln 203 A 14. <kinetian, binetian>
